reviews.review:
Do you boring about FPS games with shooters,fighting and action?

Do you want a game with more jokes and more funniest thing you ever seen?

Do you want to play Puzzle games ever made in the world?

[b]YES,THIS GAME IS YOUR ANSWER[/b]

"FPS GAME WITHOUT KILLING ANYTHING BUT GOOD FOR YOUR BRAIN"
[i]AURORA BOREALIS[i] 92/100
glados big bum
Arkadaşınız yoksa kesinlikle tavsiye etmem tek zevkli olan bir oyun değil.
oldukça iyi bir oyun özellikle grafikleri birazcık daha arttırılmış ve 1 inci oyundan daha iyi işliyo hikayeyi
it has portals

artılar +

ne kadar sonralardan yok olsada oyunun başlarında etraf ve olaylar size kaos hissiyatını veriyor

1. oyunda yaptığınız şeylerin 2. oyunda bu kadar güzel bir şekilde etki etmesi insanı sevindiriyor

mizah anlayışını daha da geliştirmiş

birinci oyundan oynanış haricinde pek bir eksikliği yok

eksiler -

birinci oyunu 3 saatte bitirip mutlu ayrıldım ve valve gibi büyük ve kaliteli bir kuruluş dahi oyunu uzatmak adına saçma şekillerde kopukluk yapmak gibi bir hataya malesef düşmüş oyun haddinden uzun 12 saatlik oynayışımda 7 buçuk saat oyun oynuyorum gibi hissetttim

hikayesinde yeni tanıştırılan ismini unuttuğum arkadaş haricinde yeni bişey nerdeyse yok bu çoğu yerde sıkılmanıza yol açıyor

mekan aşırı devasa olduğundan dolayı oyun bir noktadan sonra puzzle değilde 7 farkı bul a dönüyor nereye portal açılabilir diye koskocaman alana bakınıp duruyorsunuz hoş bir olay kesinlikle değil

birinci oyunla kıyaslandığında kötü olmasına rağmen birinci oyunun iyi yanlarının çoğunu beraberinde getirdiği için yinede oynamaya değer ve güzel bir yapım

7.3/10
oyun bir yere kadar iyi de sorna oynamak istemiyon
M Ü K E M M E L !

[MUY RECOMENDADO] El juego presenta un universo futurista en un laboratorio. Del género puzzles, que se mezcla con una curiosa movilidad que viene dada por una pistola que lanza portales que permite un enlace entre dos lugares. 

El juego en sí es muy bueno y divertido, está bien estructurado, púlido sin bugs aparentes y tiene una historia sencilla con toques de humor. 

No es de extrañar que sea el juego con más reseñas positivas en Steam.
It's portal dude. Play it.

Great game for anyone. You don’t have to like puzzles in general it’s just fun. Surprisingly replayable if you wait for a few months as well. Co-op is like a second story mode if you have a friend but don’t try to find someone to play with online as you will be waiting until your death

Pure Art.
One of the best games i've ever played.WP valve

If you like puzzles, this is your game. It's got a great story, co-op mode and community tests.
I'm totally not posting this review to get that badge thing in my profile.

Perfecto, puzzles muy bueno, algunos complicados, otros mas simples, pero todos te dan una buena dosis de juego. Glados hace el juego mucho mas llevadero, y entretenido. De lo mejor que jugue.

Опыты над людьми в стиле головоломок? Это - Portal!
Вторая часть Portal однозначно требует внимания. Отличный сюжет, головоломки, графика.
Время, потраченное на прохождение этого шедевра, ушло не зря.
Однозначно советую к покупке!

Bestes Steam Spiel?

Alles was der erste Teil gemacht hat wurde hier viel besser! 
Mehr Testräume
Mehrere Charaktere mit tollen Eigenschaften und Humor
Einen unglaublichen Soundtrack
Und viel mehr Spaß und Denken!
Ich will nichts spoilern aber das Spiel ist unglaublich! Absolut fantastisch.
Ansonsten gibt es auch nicht mehr zu sagen, außer dass es mein lieblings Steam Spiel ist <3

Всем Rep! На днях мне было скучно и я решил вспомнить классику от Valve.
Пройдя давненько замечательную первую часть, я решил - Надо пройти вторую!
и спустя несколько лет, я все же решился.
Прошел на одном дыхании, Уикли в начале не довал заскучать, да и позже тоже.
Много говорить про игру не буду и ставлю заслуженную 9 из 10!
Вторая часть вышла шедевральной, осталось только молиться на то, что Valve научаться когда нибудь делать триквелы)/
Muy buen juego, pero quien juega conmigo? :'v

Что я хочу сказать?

Игра превзошла все ожидания!

Когда я впервые зашёл в эту игру после первой части, я ожидал такой же геймплей-иногда нудный, иногда скучный.
Даже меню полностью переработанно)

Очень сильно порадовал сюжет, который нам помог понять весь сюжет всех частей-кто такая гладос, кто основал всю лабораторию.
Геймплей тоже не подкачал-1.игры мне хватило на 6 часов, а на первую часть 3.
2. Есть сетевая игра.
3.Новые фичи, такие как: гель (ускоряющий,отталкивающий,для порталов), лазер, световые линии (не помню как называются), тонели из света (не помню как называются).   Но пришлось пожертвовать энерго-шарами.
4. Очень много головоломок, если их в первой части 18-19, то во второй 55-70 а с сетевой и 200.

Эта игра очень хороша с большой буквой "Х".
Всем рекомендую!

Спасибо за внимание

(NOT MY REWEIW BTW)

The perfect sequal.
Valve took all the things Portal did right and elevated them.
The puzzles are more intrcate, new features, story is fleshed out, characters are developed, even the humor, which wroked really well in the original, is pushed further. What I really liked was how much longer it is than Portal, also the map is vast and the environment design is industrial and mysterious. 

Although not nessesary, I would recomend playing the first one before tackling Portal 2, just to appriciate it more and get more out of the experience.
I was engaged the whole time while playing, fun for anyone.

Peasy)

You might have heard it before: Portal 1+2 are among the best games ever made.

--- PRO ---
+ The gameplay is innovative and fun. All you need are the arrow keys and 2 buttons.
+ The story is wild and surprising and sometimes heart-wrenching and unlike anything you find in other games or movies.
+ Sound and dialogue is awesome. GlaDOS, Wheatley, Cave Johnson and the robots got very funny lines and great voices actors.
+ Crazy, rewarding ending. With music. I shed a tear. Do not miss the movies under Extras!

--- CON ---
- Portal 2 has one or two really difficult puzzles near the end.

10/10

Pro: 
Amazing and funny story
Runs and looks good.

Cons:
Loadscreens, they are short but often.

If the first Portal was a trial ball, that knocked out a strike - the cannonade, that followed him, shattered the whole kegling. A great continuation of the ingenious game, Portal 2 can compete well with Half-Life 2.
Despite all the Hollywood antics, impeccable humor and matured gameplay, Portal 2 remains a set of puzzles and theatrical fantastic first-person game.
Another advantage of the game this is joint company! Despite the rather modest duration, it can be regarded as a very pleasant dessert after the main dish. Great opportunity to solve puzzles with a friend.
